t: Amazon Labor Union - Wikipedia
s: March 22, 2025 - The Amazon Labor Union (ALU) is a labor union specifically for Amazon workers, created on April 20, 2021. On April 1, 2022, the Amazon workers at a warehouse in Staten Island, JFK8, backed by the ALU became the first unionized Amazon workers recognized by the National Labor Relations Board.

t: Amazon Labor Union-IBT Local 1
s: On April 1st, 2022, Amazon workers at the JFK8 Fulfilment Center on Staten Island made history by voting to form the first Amazon Union in U.S. history. Our demands are simple: better pay, better benefits, and better working conditions.

t: Union Drive Digs In At Amazon’s “Death Star” | Socialist Alternative
s: April 16, 2024 - Nestled in the hills of Northern Kentucky, high above the Ohio River, towers one of Amazon’s most crucial investments: the KCVG Air Hub. The $1.5 billion facility opened its doors just a few years ago, destined to become the cornerstone of Amazon’s plan for optimizing next-day package delivery.
